QuestData.Title: Korrath's Grimoire: Aleketh
QuestData.Description:
<These appear to be a collection of pages from a tome studying the denizens of the Maw in unsettling detail.
No doubt Ve'nari would wish to peruse this.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Korrath's Grimoire: Aleketh to Ve'nari at Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
I believe I have seen the creatures described in these pages before.
From afar, of course. Always from afar.
